'''Astrid''' is the girlfriend of [[Robert Matthews]].

==History==
Astrid and her boyfriend, [[Robert Matthews]], made a sex tape together. While he was attempting to attached a video of kids playing volleyball to a church bulletin, he accidentally attached the sex tape instead, sending it to the entire congregation. When he went to warn Astrid, he fell down two flights of stairs, seriously injuring himself.

Astrid came to the hospital to visit him, wanting him to know he at least had one person after the rest of the congregation turned their backs on him.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
She is dating [[Robert Matthews]]. The two of them made a sex tape together which was accidentally sent to their entire congregation.

==Career==
She is the choir director at First Lutheran Church.
